Text.val: *** Determine new ProcessId when not set
*** Determine new Log-filename when not set
*** Always log into C-ISAM NU FF NIET IVM MISSING TABLE
*** Reset values when AllowLogFile and LogFile = Exists
*** Allow logging into ASCII when AllowLogFile'='Y'
